Player History
Signed as a free agent by California on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/20/1986 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/26/1987 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/26/1987 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Released by San Diego on 5/17/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 5/17/1988 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/27/1988, off Ken Howell (LAD)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/22/1988, off Calvin Schiraldi (NYM)...
Injured on 3/9/1989 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: SS Mark McLemore, P Bobby Thigpen, P Arthur Rhodes, P Jack Morris. Going to CHC: LF Tim Raines)...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,892,857 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,892,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/15/1992 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for full season...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,707,143 through salary arbitration...
